W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_DETAIL.text: You found someone who isn't frozen.

W12_EVAR_MIDO_SUI_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_MIDO_SUI_000_DETAIL.text: Apparently there's a spirit here you could easily wipe the floor with.

W12_EVAR_MIDO_SUI_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_MIDO_SUI_100_DETAIL.text: Apparently there's a reasonably powerful spirit here.

W12_EVAR_MIDO_SUI_200_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_MIDO_SUI_200_DETAIL.text: Apparently there's a spirit here that would be a worthy challenge for one who is truly strong.

W12_EVAR_MIDO_SUI_300_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_MIDO_SUI_300_DETAIL.text: Apparently there's an incredibly powerful spirit here.

W12_EVAR_MIDO_SUI_001_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_MIDO_SUI_001_DETAIL.text: It feels like there's a spirit here, but you can't be certain.

W12_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_010_DETAIL.text: You acquired a spirit's power. Head back to the Heavens and search for a world that has another one.

W12_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_040_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_040_DETAIL.text: You acquired power from all the spirits. Time to head back to the Heavens and search for the door to Miyako City.

W12_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You found a world on the other side of the door where everything is encased in iceâ€”which is odd, because the world isn't that cold. Find someone who isn't frozen and see what they know.
